tool_description: Performs statistical analysis on quality control data including mean, standard deviation, coefficient of variation, and control limit calculations.

qc_data_records.description: Array of QC record identifiers to analyze

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to include in analysis (1-365)

control_limit_method.description: Method for calculating control limits (manufacturer, calculated, historical)

error_messages: Insufficient data: At least 5 QC records are required for meaningful statistical analysis.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 90 and 99.9.
Invalid control limit method: Must be one of [manufacturer, calculated, historical].
Data retrieval error: One or more QC record identifiers could not be found.
Statistical calculation error: Unable to calculate statistics due to insufficient valid data points.
usage: Provide QC record identifiers and analysis parameters. The tool calculates comprehensive statistical measures and control limits for quality assessment.

outliers_detected.description: Array of record IDs identified as outliers

data_points_analyzed.description: Number of valid data points included in analysis
